alert.note: Alert for Henry (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:41PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HENRY AND CENTRAL DES MOINES COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New London, or near Mount Pleasant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New London around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lowell, Stephenson Park, Geode State Park, Pleasant Grove, Danville, Camp L-Kee-Ta, Big Hollow Recreation Area, Middletown, Prairie Grove, Dodgeville and Beaverdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
